message: I remember playing this game after Dark Age of Camelot, and seeing it as a huge let-down (One level at a time? Really?), but I've seen a lot of love for it recently. Was it really revolutionary in some way? It came about a year after EverQuest, so I wonder what made it special.
@lanedavis maybe it was the fact that it was an online game on the console instead of computer
@gunnarsipper Come to think of it, I forgot how much I shelled out for my DAoC-capable computer. Maybe an affordable MMO was more of a revolution than I thought.
